verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Some glad morning
when this life is over,
I'll fly away.
To a home on God's
celestial shore
I'll fly away.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kor: I'll fly away, oh glory,
I'll fly away.
When it's time
Halleluja by and by,
I'll fly away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When the shadows of
this life have grown,
I'll fly away.
Like a bird from prison
bars has flown,
I'll fly away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Just a few more weary
days and then,
I'll fly away.
To a home where joy
shall never end,
I'll fly away.
